title: Boys' Kingdom II
original_name: ボーイズキングダム II
sinopse: Prequel volume of Boys' Kingdom in 2 chapters, with a chapter of special story related to Boys' Kingdom story entitled "Renai Ohkoku" and 2 additional completed story in a single chapter: "Bakuretsubishyoujo Takamine Mime" and "Baraironoijiwaru".
